title: VS.1
text: The student will apply history and social science skills to explain the relationship between physical geography and the lives of Virginia’s peoples, past and present by
subject: Virginia Studies
subs: locating Virginia and its bordering states on maps of the United States and North America;
locating and describing the relative location and physical characteristics of Virginia's five geographic regions on a map; and
locating, identifying, and describing the impact of Virginia’s bodies of water on its history, economy, and culture.
